content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the web_search command to find travel information for Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. The command returned websites like US News Travel, Time Out, and Lonely Planet. I then used the browse_website command to gather more specific information on the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in those locations. While Lonely Planet featured articles on these destinations, there was no specific information on the best attractions or activities.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.lonelyplanet.com/", "https://www.fourseasons.com/", "https://www.aman.com/", "https://www.fairmont.com/copley-plaza-boston/", "https://www.loewshotels.com/destinations", "https://www.ritzcarlton.com/", "https://www.warwickhotels.com/warwick-destinations", "https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/best-places-to-travel-in-2022"]', type='action_result')]
"""
